document_data.name: ''Potion of Water Breathing''
document_data.refs2e: <ref group="note">The [[Dungeon Master's Guide 2nd edition|''Dungeon Master's Guide]] of 2nd edition and the ''[[Encyclopedia Magica Volume III]]'' list different prices for this item, so both prices are provided together as a range.
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of water breathing''''' were magical [[potion]]s that temporarily allowed the user to breathe underwater.
document_data.Description: The liquid that composed a ''potion of water breathing'' was cloudy green and smelled like seawater. and displayed a single bubble floating on it that resembled a [[jellyfish]].
document_data.Powers:
[[File:Potion of water breathing 5e.jpeg|thumb|left]]Upon drinking a ''potion of water breathing'', the user gained the power to breathe underwater for the duration of one hour,{{Cite adventurers league/Eye of Xxiphu|6}}

Additionally, the potion rendered the imbiber immune to the crushing weight of extreme watery depths.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], ''potions of water breathing'' were sold at [[Corellon's Crown]], an herbalism shop in [[Trollskull Alley]] in the [[North Ward of Waterdeep|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]], run by the [[wood elf]] [[Fala Lefaliir]].
document_data.Creation: Suggested special ingredients for such potions were the blood of a [[water naga]], the organs of a [[nixie]], or the slime of an [[aboleth]].
